translation.Name: Rio Board #1 - News / Wanted
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Recent relatories from multiple organizations suggests that nearly 16% of the world's population is potentially infected, since then the disease has been classified as a potential danger to the humanity. According to ZPD, the most affected brazillian states are: Rio de Janeiro, Espirito Santo, SÃ£o Paulo and other 2 states.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_6: 2 Days ago another attack from the terrorist group "ZE" took place, this time medicinal tents were the target, according to a captured ZE member, Jonas Marques, "they were there to 'neutralize' the infected ones", a security camera recorded him with 2 other men and a woman attacking the medicinal tents, according to the captured ZE member, their leader was there. None of their names are known for now.
